Package weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class AttributeStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.AttributeStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaussianAttributeStats, NominalAttributeStats

    public abstract class AttributeStats
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stores the sufficient statistics about an attribute for a given rule. An AttributeStats object builds and maintains one model of the distribution of the values of its attribute for each class. In effect, it stores an estimation of P(attr = value | class).
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Builds a new attribute stats using the name of the attribute and a callback to the classifier

        public abstract void update​(double attVal,
                            java.lang.String classVal)
        Updates the statistics held by this object based on the attribute values and the class of the instance which was used.

      • bestCandidate

        public abstract CandidateAntd bestCandidate​(ExpansionMetric splitMetric,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> preSplitDist)
        Returns the best antecedent that could be found for this attribute, as a CandidateAntd object (holds the antecedent and the score calculated by the metric)
        Parameters:
        splitMetric - The metric with which to estimate the value of an antecedent
        preSplitDist - The class distribution of the rule before expansion
        Returns:
        The best antecedent, as a antecedent candidate for rule expansion
